title: Why is the game downaloading at 125kbps?
body: I dont understand this, i just downloaded a game on steam at 12Mbps and i switch over to league and it starts out that fast and slowly gets slower and slower until its down to 125kbps and its going to take an hour to download. What is wrong with this client?

replies.body: There might be something giving your network a hard time getting through to our servers specifically, but you've still got a solid connection with Steam's servers which is why that download went faster. Check out some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quickly, paying extra attention to the DNS steps. Let me know if that's able to push along those download speeds.
